data.actual_result: The whole channel name gets cleared
data.expected_result: Only the first part of the name before the hyphen should have been cleared
data.short_description: Backspacing a channel name before its first hyphen clears the whole channel name
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel settings after you create it - Try clearing the part of the channel name before the first hyphen - Here is a link which explains the scenario I encountered:
